alert.note: Alert for Huron; Saginaw; Tuscola (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 22 at 4:03AM EST until February 22 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON TODAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain expected. Total ice accumulations of around one tenth inch. * WHERE...Tuscola, Saginaw, Huron, Bay and Midland Counties. * WHEN...Until noon today. * IMPACTS...Hazardous travel conditions on untreated roads. Icing on trees, power lines, and other outdoor objects. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... Temperatures hovering around the freezing mark are expected to drop below freezing during the morning before rising again toward noon. Patchy freezing drizzle or light freezing rain leading up to sunrise increases intensity after 7 AM and then continues off and on through the morning.
info.instruction: Motorists are urged to use extra caution and plan for longer travel time. Use caution on foot across any untreated surfaces.
